data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Free kick Cruz Azul.
In the minute 2, Goal! Camilo Sanvezzo gives Mazatlan a 1-0 lead.
Corner awarded to Mazatlan.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Cruz Azul in their own half.
In the minute 4, Oscar Macias Romo signals a Cruz Azul throw-in in Mazatlan's half.
Throw-in for Mazatlan in their own half.
Throw-in Cruz Azul.
In the minute 8, Oscar Macias Romo awards the home team a throw-in.
Cruz Azul awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Mazatlan in the half of Cruz Azul.
In the minute 11, Ball safe as Cruz Azul is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Mazatlan in their own half.
Cruz Azul to take a throw-in in Mazatlan territory.
In the minute 16, Goal! Santiago Gimenez equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
Free kick for Cruz Azul in the half of Mazatlan.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Mazatlan.
In the minute 20, In Mazatlan Mazatlan drive forward through Israel Jimenez. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Mazatlan's Israel Jimenez is whistled for offside at Estadio de Mazatlan.
Goal kick for Cruz Azul at Estadio de Mazatlan.
In the minute 22, Can Mazatlan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cruz Azul's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Mazatlan in their own half.
In the minute 28, It's a goal kick for the home team in Mazatlan.
Can Mazatlan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cruz Azul's half?
Mazatlan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Cruz Azul in their own half.
In the minute 32, Miguel Sansores is booked for the home team.
In Mazatlan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Cruz Azul in the half of Mazatlan.
Cesar Huerta of Mazatlan is pulled up for offside.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a throw-in for Cruz Azul, close to Mazatlan's area.
In the minute 37, In Mazatlan Cruz Azul attack through Adrian Aldrete. The finish is off target, however.
Mazatlan have a goal kick.
Mazatlan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Cruz Azul at Estadio de Mazatlan.
Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Oscar Macias Romo.
Cruz Azul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 42, Throw-in Cruz Azul.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a Cruz Azul throw-in in Mazatlan's half.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Mazatlan in their own half.
In the minute 43, Mazatlan's Israel Jimenez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Cruz Azul goal kick.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul close to the penalty box.
In the minute 45, Mazatlan awarded a free kick in their own half.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Cesar Huerta for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 45, Cruz Azul drive upfield and Adrian Aldrete gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Mazatlan defender.
Cruz Azul to take a throw-in in Mazatlan territory.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
An attacking Cruz Azul player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Gonzalo Jara (Mazatlan) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 50, Jonathan Rodriguez smashes in a penalty at Estadio de Mazatlan. The score is now 1-2.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul in their own half.
In the minute 56, Mario Osuna for Mazatlan gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Oscar Macias Romo awards Cruz Azul a goal kick.
Free kick for Mazatlan in their own half.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Mazatlan at Estadio de Mazatlan.
Free kick for Cruz Azul in the half of Mazatlan.
Francisco Palencia is making the team's first substitution at Estadio de Mazatlan with Fernando Aristeguieta replacing Miguel Sansores.
In the minute 66, Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Cruz Azul.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Israel Jimenez.
In the minute 68, Israel Jimenez is back on his feet again.
Jorge Antonio Padilla Leal is on a sub for Israel Jimenez for Mazatlan.
Goal kick for Mazatlan at Estadio de Mazatlan.
Free kick for Mazatlan in their own half.
In the minute 70, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Mazatlan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Mazatlan.
In the minute 74, In Mazatlan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Mazatlan's Camilo Sanvezzo is on target but unsuccessful.
Mazatlan's Camilo Sanvezzo misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 74, Oscar Macias Romo awards Cruz Azul a goal kick.
Free kick for Mazatlan in the half of Cruz Azul.
Adrian Aldrete for Cruz Azul has been booked by Oscar Macias Romo and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 77, Santiago Gimenez of Cruz Azul gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mazatlan.
An attacking Cruz Azul player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
In the minute 79, Goal! The away team extend their lead to 1-3 thanks to a penalty from Jonathan Rodriguez.
Luis Mendoza is replacing Cesar Huerta for the home team.
Cruz Azul make their first substitution with Rafael Baca replacing Santiago Gimenez.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Mazatlan.
Mazatlan's Luis Mendoza breaks free at Estadio de Mazatlan. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 81, Cruz Azul have a goal kick.
In the minute 81, The away team have replaced Alexis Gutierrez with Roberto Alvarado. This is the second substitution made today by Robert Siboldi.
Mazatlan to take a throw-in in Cruz Azul territory.
Ball safe as Cruz Azul is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 85, Robert Siboldi (Cruz Azul) is making a third substitution, with Jonathan Borja replacing Elias Hernandez.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Cruz Azul in their own half.
In the minute 88, Free kick Cruz Azul.
Jose Ortiz (Mazatlan) has received a first yellow card.
Oscar Macias Romo awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Mazatlan goal kick.
Cruz Azul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Oscar Macias Romo will wait an extra 8 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a Mazatlan throw-in in Cruz Azul's half.
In Mazatlan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Mazatlan have been awarded a penalty in Mazatlan...
Free kick for Cruz Azul in their own half.
Mazatlan have a goal kick.
Cruz Azul awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul in the half of Mazatlan.
Can Cruz Azul get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mazatlan's half?
It's 2-3 as the referee blows for full-time.
Mario Osuna's spot-kick reduces the deficit 2-3.
Camilo Sanvezzo (Mazatlan) gets a yellow card.
